attributes.action: persuade and support the election of Mr Frank Field MP as the new Speaker in the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Frank Field is the obvious choice for this very important post.   He has consistently shown himself to be unbiased and to possess plenty of common sense.   His experience as an MP over many years would serve him well in the post.

rejection.details: If Gordon Brown votes it will be in his capacity as an MP, and not as Prime Minister. Therefore the petitions website is not the appropriate channel for your request.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
